title: Faraway
short_cast: Naomi Krauss, Goran Bogdan, Bahar Balci, Adnan Maral, Artjom Gilz, Vedat Erincin, Mladen Vasari, Davor Tomić, Paula Schramm, Christian Schneller
cast: Naomi Krauss, Goran Bogdan, Bahar Balci, Adnan Maral, Artjom Gilz, Vedat Erincin, Mladen Vasari, Davor Tomić, Paula Schramm, Christian Schneller

desc: After inheriting a house on a Croatian island, a woman embarks on a spur-of-the-moment trip that reignites her joy in life and opens a door to new love.
